website_summaries.verdict: A powerful whitening mouthwash that does its job without burning your mouth.
pros: Noticeable difference in whitening in just a few weeks
cons: Turns foamy in your mouth, which can feel unpleasant

website_summaries.verdict: A great option for coffee and tea drinkers and those looking for an easy way to whiten their teeth and freshen their breath all at the same time.
pros: Whitening agents help to improve the look of your teeth
cons: Must wait 30 minutes after use before eating or drinking

customer_reviews.title: Small Bottles
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Bottles are small and you can buy the biggest size so much cheaper. Wish I would have known. A rip off
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but this is not a great deal. Watch the size!!!! This is the same price per bottle as what you would spend at WalMart for the larger size. Yes, the same price as the larger size!! I would recommend buying at the store instead. Very disappointed. I feel that some sellers are taking advantage of people self-isolating at this time and not wanting/being able to get to the store.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat

customer_reviews.title: This does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I was wearing down the enamel on my teeth. With some other changes along with using this mouthwash, the problem has stopped. Love the flavor - no alcohol, no burn, just pleasant mint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of mouthwash. I got rid of gum disease between dentist visits with it and some coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Usually buy this at my local wholesale store, which I love because they are much bigger bottles when I get them there; however, this is a good alternative for me when I don’t want to make a trip to wholesale just for mouthwash. The flavor is the absolute best, it’s alcohol free, and my kids even love it. Everyone in my house gets their own bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Rogacki

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Not too strong, good taste & I like that it has fluoride - my dentist recommended it to decrease my teeth sensitivity. ( I also use toothpaste for sensitive teeth). Haven’t had any sensitivity problems since I started using about 8 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: April Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Great mouthwash!
customer_reviews.text: My dentist said alcohol free mouthwash is better. It’s also more expensive at the store and there aren’t many choices of alcohol free mouthwash. Rinse for a full minute and your mouth will come back to life! This is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: OJackson

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: The non alcohol ingredients are good. And they are not as strong as brands like listerine. I don’t think it has whitening and deep cleaning results. But for daily cleaning it’s good and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Crest nonalcoholic mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Crest non-alchoholic mouth wash is my favorite because of the cleaning action, taste and continuing breath freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Smith

customer_reviews.title: Has fluoride in it did not want fluoride
customer_reviews.text: The stuff has fluoride in it fluoride is not good for you if I had known that I would not bought it too much trouble to send it back and Amazon knows that that is why it's better to go to Walmart even though it is not as convenient but you see what you get
customer_reviews.author: william knighton

customer_reviews.title: Too small amount for two people
customer_reviews.text: I thought the bottles would be bigger. I cant complain about the product it works fine just the size of the bottle to share between two people ot went fast I did not buy this product again in its size
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan W Scott

customer_reviews.title: No burning pleasant to use
customer_reviews.text: Been using this alcohol free mouthwash for years, it’s very good
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash imo
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what it offers. The taste is actually bearable. Just don't let it sit; keep swishing.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous_

customer_reviews.title: Size Does Matter
customer_reviews.text: Size Definitely Matters: the four bottles equal the size of two normal size Crest mouthwashes available at Kroger - My bad, did not read liquid volume so I am the idiot who paid $12 per bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crest ProHealth Advanced Mouthwash With Extra Whitening
customer_reviews.text: Great Product/ use this product all the time I like Crest PS, I am Shy
customer_reviews.author: JerBear

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but doesn’t make my mouth feel quite as clean
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t make my mouth feel quite as clean as other Crest Pro-Health products have. Still, it’s not bad either, which is why I gave it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Favorite all-purpose mouthwash. The only one that covers all the whitening/freshening/anti-cavity/alcohol-free bases I like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it for me!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely whitens and cleans with no apparent side effects. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Verdugo

customer_reviews.title: Great value/quality product. Clean feeling
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these over the Listerine. Price is basically the same and I have a long lasting clean feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: Not the big bottles. Not worth $22 for a 4 of pack
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and *thought* I was getting a good deal. My fault. I didn't compare what size I had to the size that these are. $22 for 4 little bottles is kind of a rip off. I'm returning these and going to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle Tender

customer_reviews.title: Bad Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this is effective for killing germs and whitening teeth, but the taste leaves a chalky aftertaste - the Crest with Scope tastes much better.
customer_reviews.author: T Burton

customer_reviews.title: Got at great price
customer_reviews.text: Got at great price and only mouth wash my family will use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rice

customer_reviews.title: A little above average.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes so-so. Price is not very special, but it does seem to whiten teeth. There is Very little flouride in this product. Good for rinsing mouth.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Every day!
customer_reviews.text: Take care of your teeth with this mouthwash 2x a day!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Penn

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this for me. They gave me a sample I ran out so needed more. This is the same mouthwash and at a great price for how much you get.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mouth wash that doesn’t sting your mouth.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Recommended by our Dentist. Doesn’t burn or taste bad. Very effective for mouth health.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouthwash.
customer_reviews.text: Was in need of this great product. Thanks for having such a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Bennett

customer_reviews.title: So fresh and so clean!
customer_reviews.text: Very good for a deep clean and leaves my mouth feeling so fresh and so clean!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Breath
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? Its crest mouthwash. Delivery was quick and price was good.
customer_reviews.author: stephen Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Always use for fresh breath
customer_reviews.text: Our dentist recommended this for gingavitus. We use it regularly. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Salt water may work just as well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every other day or so, while comparing to just regular salt water. To keep this short- I'm starting to just prefer salt water.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Half the amount for twice as much
customer_reviews.text: Complete rip off! These are the half size bottles, you can get twice as much for half the price at target or really anywhere else for that matter. The description does tell you the correct size, but this price is twice as much, don’t buy on amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Steele

customer_reviews.title: Only shipped 3 of 4 pack
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and was supposed to be 4 pack and got 3.
customer_reviews.author: pkw

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Breath and Bright Smile
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for several years and I would not be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Mask Maker

customer_reviews.title: Teen Preteens  friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for teens preteens when its time to leave the kiddies bubblegum behind. Great transition with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: hilda hayden taylor

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Target is cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it! Target is cheaper! I thought the bottles were big but they are small and over priced. They give 68 oz for 20$ and target will give 68oz for 9$ . I’m pissed
customer_reviews.author: Malcom jackson

customer_reviews.title: did not get 4 count
customer_reviews.text: I received one large bottle instead of 4 as advertised. Real bummer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dora E. Timm

customer_reviews.title: small bottle
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was same size as the one Target sells. but it's almost like travel size for a week..
customer_reviews.author: joseph King

customer_reviews.title: One item missing cap seal
customer_reviews.text: One bottle did not have the safe plastic seal over the cap..it appears it might have been open..
customer_reviews.author: Leonte Tiniuc

customer_reviews.title: Crest ProHealth Advanced Alcohol Free Extra Deep Clean Mouthwash Fresh Mint 500 ml 4 Count
customer_reviews.text: Crest Pro Health Advanced Alcohol Free Extra Deep Clean Mouthwash Fresh Mint 500 ml 4 Count A real good tasting, [Your Not supposed to be (Eating or Drinking) this Mouthwash.] It does leave a tiny amount of good tasting fluid in your Mouth. (Almost Nothing) If you want to drink than don't buy ! ! !
customer_reviews.author: Laurent E. Foisy aka (Gene)

customer_reviews.title: Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mouthwash for a while now and it's the first time I have bought it off of amazon. I can't read cause I didn't know the bottles weren't going to be full size like the ones you buy in the store. However, the product itself is great! I have sensitive teeth and I don't get the stinging feeling like other mouthwashes leave, but my mouth feels super clean after using it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Riboul

customer_reviews.title: Warning:  the product desc does not match what you get
customer_reviews.text: The product description says "Deep Cleaning fresh mint" whereas you get "multi-protection" with no mention of fresh mint anywhere on the bottle. The image of the product matches what you actually receive. Also note the size is 500 ml not 1 liter which makes the product over-priced if you aren't careful. Just read carefully before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: lagoon

customer_reviews.title: Just like at the dentists office!
customer_reviews.text: We were given sample size bottles by the dentist and I am very happy to be able to buy it in bigger bottles. When I use it as a swish and spit product it leaves my teeth free from the film that accumulates on teeth between brushings.
customer_reviews.author: duckndpond

customer_reviews.title: Works great in just a few days, no sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome, after just a few days my teeth are at least a shade or two whiter (bottom pic was the first day using). I have no extra sensitivity. I don't mind the 4 bottles were smaller, I'm trying to avoid grocery stores, so I'll get what I can get! I'm using this in combination with Crest 3D white toothpaste!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement noted by my dentist after using regularly for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertized. Pleasant flavor and both my dentist and I noticed a difference in teeth color and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Day

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but a bit too strong
customer_reviews.text: Tried a sample bottle so I purchased this however the taste is too strong. The bottle does not have a cup or dispensing device so I end up spilling this ever so slightly, frequently. I prefer ACT brand over this.
customer_reviews.author: samspdrcr

customer_reviews.title: Weird after tatse, lots of spit after use
customer_reviews.text: Weord after taste with this, unable to eat for a long time after use and worst of all it makes me really spitty. It's very uncomfortable to use right before laying down and keeps me up. I dont know what the formula is but its way less comfortable than normal listerine.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Good taste but doesn't whiten
customer_reviews.text: Whitening minimally effective even tho I use every night and don't thereafter rinse with water. Good taste, no burning. Would send back 3 unopened bottles but just past "window," alas.
customer_reviews.author: P.J.

customer_reviews.title: Too much plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is my own fault but I didn’t realize how much plastic I’d go through, each bottle lasts me into a week or two, and doesn’t give me that satisfying deep clean feeling.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: As with all crest products, this is a good one. Wish the lid were easier to open, luckily I still had my old bottle so I could transfer the new to the old.
customer_reviews.author: Jody B

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the value, but mouthwash is always wonderful, these little mini bottles seemingly go very fast
customer_reviews.author: GWPtheTrilogy

customer_reviews.title: Really hate the taste
customer_reviews.text: I notice it's helping with the whitening, i dread rising with this because it makes me gag.
customer_reviews.author: Android Zulu

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my locker at work. I don’t get time to brush my teeth at work but I can use this. It helps. Those huge bottles are too tall for my locker. These fit great.
customer_reviews.author: LeGibbo

customer_reviews.title: Best for overnight post nasal drip
customer_reviews.text: Love this mouthwash. I even use it to clean my CPAP machine mask. However, be warned that these are the medium size bottles, not the large ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer box marked incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: Boxes are marked incorrectly. Says deep clean but bottles are enamel care. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Small size!!
customer_reviews.text: The volume is 16.9 oz. It's about the half the size of a regular size (33.8 oz.) one. It's pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were the large size
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mouthwash. Great price in bulk too.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kiper

customer_reviews.title: Small size beware
customer_reviews.text: Not as good a deal as I thought - these are roughly 1/2 the size found at Costco/Target.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the blue pieces leftover...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I disliked the blue residuals left in our sink after we spit out the mouthwash. It’s pretty hard to get rid of and it’s a bit repulsive!!!
customer_reviews.author: MKFinAdv

customer_reviews.title: Small bottles
customer_reviews.text: Mouthwash is high quality but the bottles are small. Not the normal size at the store. I think this is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It makes your mouth feel like you have just visited the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: vee

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouthwash it is the only one I use, it is a little pricey though. This is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Bambole

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate product listing
customer_reviews.text: This product listing is not accurate. If you choose the Deep Clean style, the product you actually receive is the Enamel Care style. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Logicman

product_meta.title: Crest ProHealth Advanced Mouthwash With Extra Whitening Energizing Mint Flavor 16 fl oz. Pack of 4
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 4| Style:Energizing MintCrest Pro-Health Advanced with Extra Whitening mouthwash helps you have stronger teeth for a healthier mouth while also providing an extra benefit of safely whitening teeth. with brushing by removing surface stains
feature_bullets: Safely whitens teeth with brushing by removing surface stains

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
